section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Credit agreement" includes agreeing to take or to not take certain actions by a financial institution in connection with an existing or prospective credit agreement.
This section applies only to commercial transactions.

This section does not apply to:
Credit agreements made primarily for personal, family, or household purposes; or
Credit extended by means of, or in connection with, a credit or charge card.
